channel.title: inktober on Josh Gerdes
channel.description: Recent content in inktober on Josh Gerdes

item.title: Inktober 2019
item.description: This year I finally decided to have another go at kick-starting my drawing by participating in the yearly October drawing event called Inktober. It was originally created by a favorite artist of mine named Jake Parker to promote improving skills and developing positive drawing habits. I have tried (and failed) many times over the years to try and get back into drawing. So having not really drawn anytihng since school, I was really happy with how this month turned out.
